contactspage.title: Contact
contactspage.aboutus: We're a small, passionate team dedicated to animal welfare. While we don't have a physical shelter, we partner with veterinary clinics to provide treatment and temporary housing for animals in need as they wait for their forever homes.
contactspage.map1: We primarily operate within the zone shown on the map. While our reach is focused, we strive to be helpful for as many animals as possible within our operational capacity.
contactspage.map2: We strive to expand our influence on helping stray animals over a larger zone. This requires the participation of more people, and we invite everyone to join the team.
contactspage.section2_intro: Write your thoughts and we will try to take them into account in our work.

historypage.title: Potential friends
historypage.panel1: The page displays part of the animals that are our history and inspiration. Each one has a unique story, characteristics and living conditions.

authorization.internalError: We are conducting technical work. Registration will be available very soon.

placeholder.email-reset: Email where the account is registered
